title: 18 Tir 1388 (9 July 2009) Iran protests megatorrent
description:
On 9 July 2009, the 10th anniversary of the 18 Tir 1378 massacre in which at least 17 students were killed, Iranians took to the streets again in mass protest against the dictatorial regime which, one month ago, stole the 2009 Iranian presidential election.

Tens of thousands of ordinary Iranians took part. Protesters were not only students, but men and women of all ages from all walks of life. They faced tear gas, clubs, and bullets.

Reports say that the Basij, the religious militia which has terrorized the people of Iran, were outnumbered on the streets today. They clashed with the protesters. Sometimes, they broke and ran.

The people of Iran are fighting against dictatorship. They will continue to fight. With the support of the world, they will win.

This torrent contains 61 videos, mostly from the protesters themselves. We see the Basij throwing rocks at people. We see the police unleashing tear gas. We see protesters march bravely through smoke and tear gas in every major street of Tehran and beyond.

We see supporters of the demonstrators in Britain and the Netherlands rallying against the regime.

But mostly, we hear the chants of tens of thousands of people with one voice: Marg bar diktator -- down with the dictator! 

If you want to help, join us at http://iran.whyweprotest.net/

The master list of Anonymous's Iran videos is located at http://gonzotimes.net/?page_id=500
